about.aboutMe: Hye, I'm Sajjad. I am working as a Web Developer for the last 7 years and have extensive knowledge in PHP, Laravel, VueJS, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Ajax, JS, JQuery, Livewire and GSAP. I am also a Shopify and a Wordpress Expert. New things come out every day and being a developer means you must seek to improve what you already know, I'm happy to be passionate about developing and I display this passion in every project I take.

aboutDetails.heading:
I'm Sajjad,
Full-Stack Developer & UX/UI Designer
